Description: Steatite(?) circular seal, pierced loop on the back, decorated base.
Curator's comments: Hogarth believed it to be of bone.
Bibliographic references: Ryan 1988 / The Archaeological Excavations of David George Hogarth at Asyut, Egypt 1906/7 (53)
Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 224)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr David George Hogarth
